name: io.bytes.per.checksum
description:
The number of bytes per checksum.  Must not be larger than
  io.file.buffer.size.

name: dfs.namenode.retrycache.expirytime.millis
description: The time for which retry cache entries are retained.

name: dfs.client.hedged.read.threadpool.size
description:
Support 'hedged' reads in DFSClient. To enable this feature, set the parameter
    to a positive number. The threadpool size is how many threads to dedicate
    to the running of these 'hedged', concurrent reads in your client.

name: dfs.datanode.min.outlier.detection.disks
description: Minimum number of disks to run outlier detection.

name: net.topology.script.number.args
description:
The max number of args that the script configured with
    net.topology.script.file.name should be run with. Each arg is an
    IP address.

name: dfs.datanode.transfer.socket.send.buffer.size
description:
Socket send buffer size for DataXceiver (mirroring packets to downstream
    in pipeline). This may affect TCP connection throughput.
    If it is set to zero or negative value, no buffer size will be set
    explicitly, thus enable tcp auto-tuning on some system.
    The default value is 0.

name: dfs.http.client.failover.max.attempts
description:
Specify the max number of failover attempts for WebHDFS client
    in case of network exception.

name: dfs.replication
description:
Default block replication. 
  The actual number of replications can be specified when the file is created.
  The default is used if replication is not specified in create time.

name: dfs.block.misreplication.processing.limit
description: Maximum number of blocks to process for initializing replication queues.

name: dfs.namenode.blockreport.queue.size
description: The queue size of BlockReportProcessingThread in BlockManager.
